price: 37. Siinik faxe mari maqaanél taturay hinnay umaanél wadirrooway.
arabic: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمۡ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوۡ يَتَأَخَّرَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: liman shāa minkum an yataqaddama aw yata-akhara
